About (CV)


I have started working as a Lead R&T (AI) @ Thales - cortAIx in Montreal. Previously I did my PhD @ ETS Montreal, supervised by Prof. Ismail Ben Ayed.

Current Research interests around: Unsupervised learning, Semi supervised learning, Few-shot Learning, Explainable AI, Fairness in machine learning, Domain adaptation, Optimization methods in learning, Graph Neural Network.


News

  • 2020-12-02: Our Paper on Few-shot segmentation accepted at CVPR 2021.
  • 2021-01-04: Started working as a Lead R&T (AI) @ Thales - cortAIx in Montreal.
  • 2020-12-08: Research article on fairness in clustering accepted at AAAI ‘21.
  • 2020-09-27: Paper accepted at Neurips ‘20.
  • 2020-07-30: Successfully defended my PhD dissertation.
  • 2020-07-02: ECCV paper on metric learning got accepted as spotlight!. Check here.
  • 2020-06-01: ICML paper on few-shot learning got accepted.
  • 2018-09-05: NeurIPS paper got accepted as a spotlight.

Publications

  • Few-Shot Segmentation Without Meta-Learning: A Good Transductive Inference Is All You Need?
    Malik Boudiaf, Hoel Kervadec, Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Pablo Piantanida, Ismail Ben Ayed and Jose Dolz
    In IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2021. [PDF] [Code]

  • Variational Fair Clustering
    Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Jing Yuan, Eric Granger and Ismail Ben Ayed
    In AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2021. [PDF] [Code]

  • Transductive Information Maximization For Few-Shot Learning
    Malik Boudiaf, Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Jérôme Rony, Jose Dolz, Pablo Piantanida and Ismail Ben Ayed
    Accepted in Neural Information Processing Systems conference (NeurIPS), 2020. [PDF] [Code]

  • Laplacian Regularized Few-Shot Learning
    Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Jose Dolz, Eric Granger, and Ismail Ben Ayed
    In International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML), 2020. [PDF] [Code]

  • Metric learning: cross-entropy vs. pairwise losses
    Malik Boudiaf, Jérôme Rony, Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Eric Granger, Marco Pedersoli, Pablo Piantanida and Ismail Ben Ayed
    In *European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV)    , 2020. (Spotlight) [PDF] [Code]

  • Scalable Laplacian K-modes
    Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Eric Granger and Ismail Ben Ayed
    In Neural Information Processing Systems conference (NeurIPS), Montreal, Canada, December 2018. (Spotlight) [PDF] [Code]

  • Supervised spectral subspace clustering for visual dictionary creation in the context of image classification
    Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Elisa Fromont, Damien Muselet and Marc Sebban
    In IAPR Asian Conference on Pattern Recognition (ACPR), Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 3-6 Nov. 2015. [PDF]

  • Design and Creation of a Multi-Illuminant Scene Image Dataset
    Imtiaz Masud Ziko, Shida Beigpour and Jon Y. Herdeberg
    In International Conference on Image and Signal Processing (ICISP), Springer, 531-538, July 2014. [PDF] [Dataset]
